SELECT ai.id, ai.project_id, ai.user_id, ai.application_date, ai.status, ai.application_data, ai.first_audit_date, ai.first_audit_status, ai.first_audit_content, ai.first_audit_sign, ai.admin_audit_date, ai.admin_audit_status, ai.admin_audit_content, ai.admin_audit_sign, ai.content, ai.bank_id, ai.file_path, ai.staff_id,
pi.project_name, pi.project_type, pi.start_date, pi.end_date, pi.amount_per_person, pi.quota, pi.policy_text,
stui.name, stui.sex, stui.phone, stui.email, stui.images, stui.user_id, ci.name as className, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName FROM application_info ai LEFT JOIN project_info pi ON (pi.id = ai.project_id) LEFT JOIN student_info stui ON (stui.id = ai.user_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = stui.major_id) left join class_info ci on (ci.id = stui.class_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.teacher_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND pi.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.projectName},'%')
AND ai.status = #{queryParam.status}
AND stui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.studentName},'%')
ORDER BY ai.application_date DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN application_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.application_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN application_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.application_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND oi.status = '已通过' ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
